universal_ecom_v1.livraison: Standard delivery takes 3-5 business days (Free from $50). Express delivery takes 1-2 days ($15).
universal_ecom_v1.retours: We offer a 30-day return policy for unused items in original packaging. Returns are free.
universal_ecom_v1.paiements: We accept Visa, Mastercard, PayPal and payment on delivery.

universal_sme_v1.services: We offer consultations, repairs and maintenance services.
universal_sme_v1.tarifs: Consultations cost $50 (deducted from final invoice). Hourly rate is $80/hour.

dental_intake_v1.urgence_dentaire: For severe pain or trauma, we have same-day emergency slots between 11am-12pm and 3pm-4pm.
dental_intake_v1.assurances: We accept most insurance plans. We also offer payment plans.
dental_intake_v1.offre_nouveau_patient: New Patient Package at $99 includes exam, X-rays and cleaning.
dental_intake_v1.dentiste: The doctor specializes in cosmetic dentistry and implants.

agency_v3.produits: VocalIA offers 2 Voice AI products: Voice Widget (24/7 voice assistant for websites) and Voice Telephony (AI phone line).

agency_v3.langues: 5 languages supported: French, English, Spanish, Arabic and Moroccan Darija.
agency_v3.contact: Contact us via vocalia.ma/booking or email contact@vocalia.ma.
agency_v3.tarifs: Free (limited Widget), Pro $99/month, Enterprise on request.

healer_v1.specialites: General Medicine, Pediatrics, Gynecology, Physiotherapy, Cardiology.
healer_v1.urgence: Call 911 for life-threatening emergencies. For clinic emergencies, call at opening time 8am.
healer_v1.rdv: Appointments can be made by phone or through our patient portal.

mechanic_v1.vehicule_courtoisie: We provide courtesy vehicles by reservation.
mechanic_v1.garantie: All repairs are guaranteed for 1 year parts and labor.

counselor_v1.documents: Please bring any contracts or correspondence related to your case to the first appointment.
counselor_v1.localisation: Our office is downtown, parking available.

concierge_v1.wifi: Free high-speed WiFi throughout the property.
concierge_v1.parking: Private parking available at $20 per night.

stylist_v1.annulation: Cancellation must be made 24 hours in advance.

recruiter_v1.avantages: Health insurance, remote work, and continuous training.
